Сколько по времени идет зачисление на сч: How long does it take to deposit money into my account?
Если оплата производится кредитной карто: If payment is made by credit card or electronic payment methods, crediting is automatic. When making a bank transfer, it usually takes 2-3 days to deposit the funds into the account.
Как я могу пополнить счет?: How can I deposit my account?
Существует несколько способов пополнения: There are several ways to deposit and withdraw funds from your personal cabinet. You can deposit your account through your personal cabinet. Могу ли я восстановить пароль, если забы: Can I restore the password if I forgot the data?
Вы можете восстановить данные для входа: You can restore your login details by clicking the «Forgot Password» button. Enter the email you specified during registration and click «Restore password». Instructions will be sent to your email.
Alfido Invest - британско-русская компан: Alfido Invest is a British-Russian company that creates software for digital asset management. The main activity is creating solutions for digital asset management. For the last 3 years our team worked in family-office format, serving only its own funds and assets of relatives and close people. When it became clear that our expertise had passed the test of time and several crises (such as the 2017-2018 cryptocurrency market crash), our hedging and earning tools became open to offer.
Компания Alfido Invest объединяет две те: Alfido Invest combines two trends - the mainstream business model of the cryptocurrency world and the obvious trend of domination of businesses with new technological capabilities. After all, with the Blockchain industry, it is now possible to invest in breakthrough technologies at a very early stage.
Миссия Alfido Invest заключается в том,: Alfido Invest's mission is to create a connection between the old and new economies, to serve and protect clients' money who are looking to invest in new types of economic interactions that are not possible in the old economies. According to the director of Alfido Invest, today the fund operates on the principle of the new economy with fully transparent management, and provides clients with maximum expertise and understanding of the market.
Alfido Invest позиционируется как долгос: Alfido Invest is positioned as a long-term fund with an emphasis on working with projects that will gradually increase in value in the long term. Registration in England, in the most loyal for crypto-projects city London, guarantees not only the protection of rights for investors, but also protects the company's activity at the legislative level.
Алгоритмическая торговля – это автоматиз: Algorithmic trading is an automated system of placing and managing orders for trading in various financial instruments, using computer programs based on mathematical algorithms. The trading process in the course of algo-trading occurs without human participation. Algo-trader or quant trader only describes the algorithm of the robot (mechanical trading system (MTS)) in various situations in a programming language.
Базируясь на анализе прыдыдущего ценовог: Based on the analysis of the previous price series of financial instruments, they calculate the probability of the future price hitting a certain range. The robot enters or exits a trade at certain changes in the price chart of the traded asset. A popular method of algorithmic trading is High Frequency Trading (HFT), that is, electronic trading at very high speed. High-frequency trading robots open and close a large volume of short-term positions in order to make a small profit.
Существует множество стратегий алготрейд: There are many algorithmic trading strategies that programmers put into a trading robot.
Взвешенная по объёму средняя цена. Распр: Volume-weighted average price. Distributes bid volumes evenly over a certain time interval at the best bid or offer price, but not more than the weighted average price for the set period.
Процент от объема торгов. Поддерживает ф: Percentage of trading volume. Maintains a fixed percentage of market participation that is selected by the user. Trades frequent and small trades, responding well to volume spikes.
Взвешенная по времени средняя цена. Испо: Time-weighted average price. Executes orders by evenly spacing them across equal time intervals. The strategy does not consider projected changes in trading volumes, which can negatively affect the market.
Айсберг. Выставленная заявка на продажу: Iceberg. A placed sell or buy order does not show the full size of the exchange order. Potential buyers see only a part of the order, and only after its execution the next part is published. And so until its full execution.
Задачами стратегии являются: раннее выяв: The strategy objectives are: early identification of the incipient trend using various technical analysis indicators, issuing signals to trade in the trend direction and issuing signals to close positions when the trend ends.
Стратегия краткосрочных внутридневных сп: The strategy of short-term intraday speculative operations. High-frequency trading robots are most often used for scalping; they open and close positions in a fraction of a second when a small profit of a few pips is reached. The strategy is mostly used in futures markets, where the turnover commission is much lower.
Для того, чтобы зарабатывать на рынке кр: You don't have to learn the ins and outs of the virtual world to make money in the cryptocurrency market. It is enough to understand the basic principles of work and invest in the technology, using the tools that already exist.
Исламские счета для ведения деятельности: Islamic accounts for trading at Forex market have existed for quite a long time. Countries where Islam is the dominant religion, as well as many other countries in the world, consider Forex market as an effective instrument for regulating currency policy and currency transactions in export-import transactions.
Противоречат ли принципы трейдинга шариа: Do the principles of trading contradict the Shariah?
Этот вопрос возникает в том случае, когд: This question arises when businessmen professing Islam begin to look at the foreign exchange market not only as an opportunity to buy the needed currency at a better price, but also as a way to make a profit. It should be noted at once that in the Muslim law the exchange of currencies is allowed by the hadith (a saying, approval) that it is allowed to exchange certain goods for each other, but only in equal proportions and passing them from hand to hand.
Другими словами обмен разрешен при одном: In other words, the exchange is allowed under one condition: when converting currencies, there should not be a gap in time, and one party to the transaction should not have debts to the other party to the transaction. As it becomes clear, Islam completely rejects usury, the essence of which is a gap in time - deferral. Therefore, currency exchange transactions carried out without deferred payment and at the market rate established at the time of the transaction, from the standpoint of Islam, are permissible. Consequently, currency exchange transactions in banks and exchange offices are permitted.
Подробнее об исламском счёте: Learn more about the Islamic account
Присутствует в финансовых операциях, где: It is present in financial operations, where one sells/buys something that the participant of the transaction does not own. This includes the following points - a trader almost always buys/sells currency at a different price than what he sees on his computer screen and leverage (the basis of margin trading), which allows opening trades for an amount exceeding the market participant's own capital.
Принято относить прибыль, полученную без: This includes profits made without the investment of labor and capital.  For this reason, all gambling falls under Maysir. The Forex market is not considered to be a game of chance. It is considered that a trader does not act blindly, but analyzes and opens deals being guided by real forecasts and calculations. But it is necessary to admit that only few people have such skills. And for non-professionals Forex - is a game in roulette. In this connection it is necessary to note that all brokerage companies strongly recommend beginning traders to be trained in Internet trading before depositing money to a real account. In other words, if the trader has not passed the training and trades with the use of leverage - it means that he/she wants to gain profit without investing any efforts and only partially with his/her own money. We conclude: if a person is a Muslim and wants to try his fortune on the Forex market, he must have a good education, practice on a demo account and trade only with his own money.
По поводу понятия риба дискуссии идут по: The concept of Rib is a matter of discussion time and time again. Some people think that in the relations between the traders and brokerage companies there is an obvious usurious interest for the service rendering in the form of spread, other people disprove this statement.
Как открыть Исламский счет?: How do I open an Islamic account?
Для открытия исламского счета требуется: To open an Islamic account, proof of religious affiliation is required. This is the main difference in the broker's requirements when a client opens an Islamic account. In all other respects the procedure of opening this type of account is similar to the procedure of opening other accounts.
Вот так обстоят дела в отношении ислама: That's how things are in relation to Islam to the Forex market. But, nevertheless, not to restrict the citizens professing Islam, the brokerage companies have specifically created Islamic accounts, which allow you to operate at the Forex market with the most different trading instruments with no swap and position transfer fees.
